ee anuwa rajayata dan manthriwarun 154 k sitina athara wipakshaye manthri sankhyawa 70 ki.rajayata awashya thunen deke balaya me wanawita sapura athayi amathyawaraya awadharanaya karayi.me anuwa dashaka thunakata pasu shri lankawe ihalama mattame shakthimathma rajaya dan bihiwi athi bawath eya shri lankawe digukalina deshapalana sthawarathwayata ha anagatha sanwardhanaye suba lakunak bawath des wides boho deshapalana wicharakayo pawasathi.dan shri lanka rajaya aasiyawe athi sthawarama rajaya lesa handinwiya haki athara me nisa rajayata awashya ratata uchitha siyaluma wyawastha sanshodhana badhawakin thorawa sammatha kara ganimata awasthawa labi athi bawa da owuhu penwa dethi.emen ma rate sanwardhana ha widesha aayojana prawardhanayan sandaha da me deshapalana sthawarathwaya hethu wanu athayi da deshapalana wicharakayan ge mathayayi.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
